title: Eurosport - Wikipedia
snippet: WBD would serve as managing partner, with Eurosport's UK operations to be merged with the BT Sport networks. As part of the agreement, WBD also negotiated a deal for BT Group to distribute Discovery+ to its television and BT Sport subscribers. WBD would rebrand BT Sport as TNT Sports, deriving ...

title: Eurosport To Be Replaced By TNT In The UK As Warner Bros. Discovery Shakes Up Sports Portfolio
snippet: Storied sports channel Eurosport will disappear from British screens next month as Warner Bros. Discovery rejigs its sports portfolio.

title: Un deal à plus de 70 milliards d'euros : Netflix va racheter Warner Bros... mais pas Eurosport
snippet: Netflix a annoncé racheter le groupe Warner Bros, mais le deal n'inclut pas les chaînes de Discovery, dont Eurosport. (E. Garnier/L'Équipe) Sacha Nokovitch publié le 5 décembre 2025 à 15h30

title: List of assets owned by Warner Bros. Discovery - Wikipedia
snippet: Ellen Digital Ventures (joint venture between Warner Bros. Digital Networks and Ellen DeGeneres) Eurosport - merged/absorbed into TNT Sports in 2025

title: Warner Bros. Discovery Announces New Corporate Structure To Enhance Strategic Flexibility | Warner Bros. Discovery
snippet: Warner Bros. Discovery expects to start the foundational steps immediately and to complete the implementation of the new corporate structure by mid-2025.
